text: Chicago Fire is an American drama television series created by Michael Brandt and Derek Haas with Dick Wolf as an executive producer. It is the first show of Wolf Entertainment's Chicago franchise. The series premiered on NBC on October 10, 2012. On February 27, 2020, NBC renewed the series for its 9th, 10th, and 11th season. ==References== Category:2012 American television series debuts Category:Chicago (franchise) Category:Television series set in Chicago
title: Chicago Fire (TV series)
